mapper.select: SELECT auth_code FROM zhiyin_user_reg_sms WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into zhiyin_user_reg_sms (id, telephone, auth_code, create_time, expire_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{telephone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{authCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into zhiyin_user_reg_sms
id,
telephone,
auth_code,
create_time,
expire_time,

#{telephone,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update zhiyin_user_reg_sms

auth_code = #{authCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
